title: GCSE Chemistry Experiment Inquiry: Mobile Learning Process for Determining Acid Concentration

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Integration of smartphone-based videos/quizzes, offline experiment kits distribution, and mobile feedback systems

learning_goals: Students can design acid-base titration experiments using guided inquiry methods.
Students can accurately calculate acid concentration to two decimal places by analyzing experimental data.
Students enhance collaborative skills by sharing experimental results and providing feedback with peers via a mobile platform.

resources: Portable Basic Experiment Kit (pH Test Strips, Syringes, etc.)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
